dict.acceptation: 保持；留在心中，记住；雇用；付定金保留；

sent.orig: How can I manipulate user accounts, and still retain security?
sent.trans: 我怎么维护用户账号，并能确保其安全？

sent.orig: Like other people, Saudis want to be modern but also to retain their identity.
sent.trans: 同时，西方国家的科技还大大提高了他们的生活水准。

sent.orig: Even if Chelsea do not retain their crown, they have still been magnificent.
sent.trans: 在这一层面上，即使切尔西本赛季未能成功卫冕，他们也已表现得十分出色。

sent.orig: Do you retain any connections to your Sleeper life?
sent.trans: 你和你的沉睡者生活还有联系吗？

sent.orig: ChB could still retain over 90% activity after two hours at 55 ℃.
sent.trans: ChB在55℃以下保温2 h仍能够保持90%以上的活性。
